Once i go into the spectre terminal to purchase the weapons, there seems to be 2 blank slots there, only displaying the cost, and even when you purchase them, nothing happens.

Also there only seems to be 6 / 7 of the weapons that are suppose to be there.

Hi All :)

Iv done some checking & from what I can tell the 2-blank spots are weapons from the Multi player resurgance DLC.

I could be wrong so if anybody knows the info would be appreciated :) Thanks.
